points: AI-powered transcription, summarization, and study tools.
Accurate transcriptions for better learning and note-taking.
Interactive flashcards and quizzes to reinforce knowledge.
Intuitive platform for students, researchers, and professionals.
Secure and privateâ€”your data is always protected.

faqs.question: How accurate are the transcriptions?
faqs.answer: Our AI models achieve up to 95% accuracy, depending on audio quality.

faqs.question: What's included in the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes up to 10 transcript saves per month, 35 YouTube transcriptions, unlimited flashcard generation with up to 5 saved batches, 5 quizzes with up to 3 saved with feedback, 100 summaries with up to 10 saved, and 5 AI Quizzes with up to 3 saved.

faqs.question: How are flashcards and quizzes generated?
faqs.answer: Our AI extracts key concepts from the transcript to create interactive flashcards and quizzes.

faqs.question: Is my content secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use encryption to protect your data and never share it without permission.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel whenever you want with no penalties.
